csw:Record.dc:title: Water quality indicators for European rivers
csw:Record.dc:subject: Hydrography
Sector: Water management
Spatial coverage: Europe
Variable domain: Land (hydrology)
Product type: Climate indices
Temporal coverage: Future
inlandWaters
csw:Record.dct:abstract:
This dataset contains modelled data for phosphorous and nitrogen concentrations and loads. The data comes from the Swedish Meteorological and Hydrological Institute E-HYPE model at catchment level for Europe. These water quality indicators were computed as a part of a proof of concept contract designed to speed up the workflow in impact assessments and to simplify climate change adaptation of water management practices across Europe. These indicators are provided as averages over 30 year periods, either for each calendar month or for the whole period. For the reference period (1971-2000) the absolute values are given, whereas for the future periods the relative changes are provided. In addition to total amounts, organic and inorganic parts are provided for nitrogen. For phosphorous, in addition to the total amount, particulate and soluble parts are provided. Values of the temperature of the water is provided for the same periods.
Variables in the dataset/application are: Nitrogen concentrations, Nitrogen loads, Phosphorous concentrations, Phosphorous loads, Water temperature
